item.title: My Resume
item.description: Junhua’s Resume Markdown is the most popular markup language that can be used to format documents. It can be used to create websites,ebooks,email,chats in discussions forums. Resume Education Graduated in Shanghai Da Tong high school Employment CTO in boolan.com MD can write bold texts, italiic italic texts Headings No of #‘s represent the type of heading. Github will automatically add id’s to headings, so the text will be automatically linked.

item.title: 创世纪
item.description: Advertisement :) pica - high quality and fast image resize in browser. babelfish - developer friendly i18n with plurals support and easy syntax. You will like those projects!
